thread.title: Ayesha Takia responds to haters after being bashed
thread.title_full: Ayesha Takia responds to haters after being bashed

title: Ayesha Takia responds to haters after being bashed
text:
Ayesha Takia responds to haters after being bashed IANS /Mumbai   2.23 pm Share 
Bollywood actress Ayesha Takia Azmi (Picture retrieved from Instagram) She later posted another image of herself taking a selfie. Actress Ayesha Takia Azmi has slammed all those who trolled her over various social media platforms for getting under the knife. A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:55am PST Ayesha attended an event, where her swollen lips and cheeks made people wonder if she had undergone plastic surgery. She later became a victim to trolls, where many began discussing about her "changed" face. In response, Ayesha took to Instagram on Friday night to share a cryptic photograph which read: "You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches." She later posted another image of herself taking a selfie. A post shared by Ayesha Takia Azmi (@ayeshatakia) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:14am PST In the caption, the "Wanted" actress wrote: "Crazy long arm? Me taking selfie! Why not! Stop selfie shaming all you girls and guys who love yourself enough to take your own picture and feel good about it should be proud. "Don't let anyone tell you to dim your confidence and self love. We live in a world of judgements and bullying, so we need to rise above that and just be who we are and be proud of it. Love yourself," she added. Share
